title: FSIB defers interview for SBI chairman's position
description: FSIB defers SBI Chairman selection interview for unknown reasons. New date post new government formation after June 4 to replace Dinesh Khara, retiring on August 28. FSIB recommends candidate, final decision by Appointments Committee of the Cabinet led by PM Narendra Modi. Selection panel includes former DoPT secretary Bhanu Pratap Sharma, Animesh Chauhan, Deepak Singhal, and Shailendra Bhandari.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
